name: Mémoires Oubliées
description:
PITCH

Embody Angelina and wander through a dreamlike world composed of her shattered memories.

Get up from your throne and go explore your past which is symbolised by musical notes you have to collect. Try to get them all to rebuild Angelina's memories while you can appreciate re-orchestrated music from the original play !

GAMEPLAY

DETAILS

Developer: ArtFX Promo 2023

Release: December 2021 

Platform: PC / Arcade

Genre: Puzzle, Platformer

Languages: French

CONTROLS (Keyboard / Controller)

Z/Left Stick: Move forward                                  S/Left Stick: Move Backward 

Q/Left Stick: Move Left                                        D/Left Stick: Move Right  

F/Y(xbox controller): Interact                              Space/A(xbox controller) : Jump

Escape/Start : Open menu

METADATA

Average sessions: 5-10 min
Multiplayer: No
Languages: French
Adult content: No
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
